channel.title: Comments for Accidental Films and TV

item.title: Comment on Mr Table Tennis by Derrick.Rooza
item.dc:creator: Derrick.Rooza
item.description: Yes had the unfortunate opportinity to play against Mr.Meyer in his garage when I was playing for HEATHCROWN from heathfield...quite an experience and quite educational.Mr Meyer coached me while we were playing a league match...won't mention the score..but I dont think I won one game.Go from strength to strength Sir..all the best
item.content:encoded: Yes had the unfortunate opportinity to play against Mr.Meyer in his garage when I was playing for HEATHCROWN from heathfield…quite an experience and quite educational.Mr Meyer coached me while we were playing a league match…won’t mention the score..but I dont think I won one game.Go from strength to strength Sir..all the best

item.title: Comment on Femi-What??! by Hisham Ashour
item.dc:creator: Hisham Ashour
item.description:
Hello,
I am currently doing research on the Engender TV magazine for my media context class at Northwestern University. I was wondering if I could receive some information regarding critical responses to the show and viewer numbers.
Thank You & Best Regards, Hisham Ashour
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I am currently doing research on the Engender TV magazine for my media context class at Northwestern University. I was wondering if I could receive some information regarding critical responses to the show and viewer numbers.

Thank You & Best Regards,
Hisham Ashour

item.title: Comment on My First Film by Abdul-Mu'izz
item.dc:creator: Abdul-Mu'izz
item.description: Amazing stuff Megan. I noticed you naturally doing well in media as I saw you many times broadcasting news, presenting or using your skills to produce quality to us. Keep it up and tell me when the documentary is available to the public.
item.content:encoded: Amazing stuff Megan. I noticed you naturally doing well in media as I saw you many times broadcasting news, presenting or using your skills to produce quality to us. Keep it up and tell me when the documentary is available to the public.

item.title: Comment on My First Film by Jurina Nkwazi
item.dc:creator: Jurina Nkwazi
item.description: What a nice piece! Well done and keep it up.
item.content:encoded: What a nice piece! Well done and keep it up.

item.title: Comment on My First Film by Megan Jonkers
item.dc:creator: Megan Jonkers

item.title: Comment on My First Film by Penuel
item.dc:creator: Penuel
item.description: Well done Megan!!!! This is a very inspiring story. I wish everyone can read this especially when there are so many young people who feel lost and have no inspiration. I can't wait to see the film.
item.content:encoded: Well done Megan!!!! This is a very inspiring story. I wish everyone can read this especially when there are so many young people who feel lost and have no inspiration. I can’t wait to see the film.

item.title: Comment on Text Animation by TLS
item.dc:creator: TLS
item.description: Thanks for applying a keen eye, Carsten.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for applying a keen eye, Carsten.

item.title: Comment on Text Animation by Carsten
item.dc:creator: Carsten
item.description: The 'n' at the end of Kozain looks weird. Like it's kerned too far to the right. Otherwise, nifty.
item.content:encoded: The ‘n’ at the end of Kozain looks weird. Like it’s kerned too far to the right. Otherwise, nifty.

item.title: Comment on Kentridge and Dumas in Conversation by Joe kelly
item.dc:creator: Joe kelly
item.description: Thanks. Your thoughts and impressions on on a film I am unlikely to see are illuminating indeed. Not many reviewers I've read do half as well. On the basis of your keen-eyed observations here, I would make every means to see a film (of the sort) that you would make, so I hope that you do get the opportunity to make a film on your artist friend.
item.content:encoded: Thanks. Your thoughts and impressions on on a film I am unlikely to see are illuminating indeed. Not many reviewers I’ve read do half as well. On the basis of your keen-eyed observations here, I would make every means to see a film (of the sort) that you would make, so I hope that you do get the opportunity to make a film on your artist friend.
